Method.Doc: Get the fields of all statements of an agreement

XSelect.XField: scst.id, sc.uuid, st.id as statement_id, st.code as statement_code, st.field as statement_field, stl.statement as statement, stl.name as statement_name, stl.description as statement_description, stt.code as statement_type_code, sttl.name as statement_type_name, sttl.description as statement_type_description, st.expire_date_expression, cd.code as controlled_document_code, cd.name as controlled_document_name, cd.uri_external as controlled_document_uri_external, COALESCE(cdv.code, '') as controlled_document_version_current_code

XFrom.XTable: fw_agreement_schema sc INNER JOIN fw_agreement_schema_statement scst ON (scst.id_agreement_schema = sc.id) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement st ON (st.id = scst.id_agreement_statement) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_lang stl ON (stl.id = st.id AND stl.lang='{param->_lang}') INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_type stt ON (stt.id = st.id_agreement_statement_type) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_type_lang sttl ON (sttl.id = stt.id AND sttl.lang='{param->_lang}') LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_rm_controlled_document cd ON (cd.id = st.id_controlled_document) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_rm_controlled_document_version cdv ON (cdv.id = cd.id_current_version)

XWhere.XCondition: AND scst.start_date <= {param->start_date} AND (scst.end_date IS NULL OR scst.end_date > {param->start_date})
